StartHost.question: Are you sure you want to continue?

StartDescription.title: Welcome to The blockchain game!
StartDescription.info: Based on the game designed by J Scott Christianson. In this digital implementation, you will learn the basics of Blockchain in a fun and interactive way.
StartDescription.quote: “The blockchain is the financial challenge of our time. It is going to change the way that our financial world operates” - Blythe Masters

GuestWelcome.title: You are almost there!
GuestWelcome.info: Please enter the pin code that your teacher/instructor has given you. Choose a fancy name.

Information.label: No one besides you can know it!
Information.wait: Please wait until the next step...

Step_2.label: Hashing?
Step_2.info_1: It is just applying a formula.
Step_2.info_2: What formula? Whatever the blockchain wants!
